### 2.0.2 (June 14th 2015)
- Make the library work with browser globals.

### 2.0.1 (June 14th 2015)
- Compile to UMD so you can import this hackily from a browser script.

- API overhaul. See README for the new, cleaner API!
- Drop Bower support.
- Add npm support.

## 1.0.0
- Initial release.
